rule.conditionDesc: ( sharedflag in CurrentRecord = 3 OR sharedflag in CurrentRecord = 4)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Apply To">sharedflag</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="number">3</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Apply To">sharedflag</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="number">4</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Share Record to Incident Subcategory (when ( sharedflag in CurrentRecord = 3 OR sharedflag in CurrentRecord = 4))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var tablename = \"imSubcategory\";\u000avar subcategory_name = record.subcategory_name;\u000avar category = record.category;\u000avar active = record.active;\u000avar sharedflag = record.sharedflag;\u000avar company = record.company;\u000avar description = record.description;\u000alib.HelpDeskCategoryUtil.addSubCategoryRecord(tablename, subcategory_name, category, active, sharedflag, company, description);"}

rule.conditionDesc: ( Apply To in CurrentRecord = 4 OR Apply To in CurrentRecord = 5)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Apply To">sharedflag</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="number">4</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Apply To">sharedflag</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="number">5</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Share Record to Problem Subcategory (when ( Apply To in CurrentRecord = 4 OR Apply To in CurrentRecord = 5))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var tablename = \"pbmSubcategory\";\u000avar subcategory_name = record.subcategory_name;\u000avar category = record.category;\u000avar active = record.active;\u000avar sharedflag = record.sharedflag;\u000avar company = record.company;\u000avar description = record.description;\u000a\u000alib.HelpDeskCategoryUtil.addSubCategoryRecord(tablename, subcategory_name, category, active, sharedflag, company, description);"}
